Plot: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.
Title: Quarantine
Writer: John Erick Dowdle (screenplay), Drew Dowdle (screenplay), Jaume Balagueró (motion picture "Rec"), Luiso Berdejo (motion picture "Rec"), Paco Plaza (motion picture "Rec")
Actors: Jennifer Carpenter, Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech
tomatoConsensus: Quarantine uses effective atmosphere and consistent scares to stand above the crop of recent horror films.
